Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 4; D1: 4; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 2; D7: 2; D8: 1; D9: 1; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: D: 8; W: 6 Spell DC: D: 16; W: 14
Spells:
Animal Friendship (D1 Ench): R30' Target beast convinced of good intent (Wis neg) for 1 dy
Awaken (D5 Tran): Touched beast or plant gains Intelligence 10, speech, and movement and becomes friendly for 30 dy
Beast Sense (D2 Divi): Self perceives through touched beast's senses for conc or 1 hr
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 1d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Conjure Animals (D3 Conj): R60' Summons obedient fey creatures for conc or 1 hr
Conjure Fey (D6 Conj): R90' Summons obedient fey for conc or 1 hr
Conjure Minor Elementals (D4 Conj): R90' Summons obedient elementals for conc or 1 hr
Darkvision (D2 Tran): Touched sees 60' in dark for 8 hr
Feign Death (D3 Necr): Touched appears dead for 1 hr
Fire Storm (D7 Evoc): R150' 10 10' cu inflicts 7d10 HP fire (Dex half)
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Cha checks w/target for conc or 1 min
Greater Restoration (D5 Abju): Touched becomes unexhausted, uncharmed, unpetrified, or uncursed or regains ability or HP
Guidance (D0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check w/in conc or 1 min
Gust Of Wind (D2 Evoc): 60'x10' wind pushes 15' (Str neg), inflicts half movement for conc or 1 min
Healing Word (D1 Evoc): R60' Target regains 1d4+2 HP
Jump (D1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Poison Spray (D0 Conj): R10' Target suffers 4d12 HP poison (Con neg)
Polymorph (D4 Tran): R60' Transforms target creature (Wis neg) for conc or 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Produce Flame (D0 Conj): Lights 10' radius for 10 min, self can make ranged spell attack inflicting 4d8 HP
Protection From Energy (D3 Abju): Touched gains resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for conc or 1 hr
Ray Of Sickness (W1 Necr): R60' Target suffers 2d8 HP poison and poisoned 1 rd (Con not poisoned)
Reverse Gravity (D7 Tran): R50' Items in 50' radius fall upward for conc or 1 min
Shapechange (D9 Tran): Self polymorphs for conc or 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Shillelagh (D0 Tran): Touched club gains +8 attacks, inflicts 1d8 HP for 1 min
Sunburst (D8 Evoc): 60' radius inflicts 12d6 HP radius and blindness (Con half, no blindness) for 1 min
Thunderwave (D1 Evoc): 15' cu inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (Con half, no push)
Wall Of Fire (D4 Evoc): R120' 60'x20' wall inflicts 5d8 HP fire (Dex half) for conc or 1 min
Wall Of Stone (D5 Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10' panels for conc or 10 min
Wall Of Thorns (D6 Conj): R120' 60'x10' wall inflicts 7d8 HP piercing (Dex half) for conc or 10 min
Magic Notes:
Archdruid: Unlimited Wild Shape
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Know 2 W0 spells, cast 1 W1 spell/long rest
Balm Of The Summer Court: R120' Distribute 20d6 HP healing and 20 temporary HP to targets 1/long rest
Beast Spells: Cast spells during Wild Shape
Elemental Adept (Cold): Cold spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Thunder spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Faithful Summons: Automatically summons 4 creatures to protect for 1 hr when self incapacitated 1/long rest
Guardian Spirit: Summoned creatures in Spirit Totem aura regain 10 HP each rd
Hearth Of Moonlight And Shadow: 30' radius gives total cover and +5 Stealth and Perception
Hidden Paths: Teleport self 60' or willing touched 30' 2/long rest
Mighty Summoner: Summoned creatures gain +2 HP/HD and magical natural weapons
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Spirit Totem (Bear): R60' Targets in 30' radius gain 25 temporary HP and Adv on Str for 1 min 1/short rest
Spirit Totem (Hawk): R60' Targets in 30' radius gain Adv on Perception and self use Reaction to give Adv on attack for 1 min 1/short rest
Spirit Totem (Unicorn): R60' Allies gain Adv to detect creatures in 30' radius for 1 min, self heal spells restore +20 HP 1/short rest
Walker In Dreams: After short rest, cast Dream, Scrying, or Teleportation Circle connected to last long rest place 1/long rest
Wild Shape: Transform into CR 1 creature for 10 hr unlimited/short rest
Notes
* Ability Boosts: +1 Constitution
